p: Current applications: remdesivir (RDV) is one of the most important drugs named in the treatment of COVID-19 and is being extensively researched. In 2017, Gilead Sciences developed RDV for the treatment of Ebola virus infection. It is a broad-spectrum drug having antiviral activities against RNA viruses such as SARS-CoV-2, SARS-CoV, and MERS-CoV [ 12].
